summary: Adds an Imperial Destruction Mage to Whiterun
descriptionHtml:
Karena Imperial Destruction Mage UNP

Adds an Imperial Destruction Mage to Whiterun

Due to a request I\'ve uploaded a version with the hair included in the mod.  Apachii gave me permission to use the hairstyle, so please thanks goes to Apachii.  If you have Apachii installed already there isn\'t any reason to install this one.

To look like she does in the pictures:
DIMONIZED UNP female body UNP Base Main body V1dot2 by dimon99 here http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709
Better Females version 3 Makeup Version 3 and No Shine by BellaGail here 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812
Natural Eyes by nevenbridge here http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3589

Required:
Requires Apachii\'s new hair, ApachiiSkyHairFemale, without it you\'ll CTD, found here 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168, under Optional Files.

Update 1.7 is apparenlty required too since I built this mod after being updated.

She is set to
Lvl 1 auto lvl
Weight 100
Essential and Nonessential versions
Destruction Mage:
	Spells:
		Firebolt
		Lightning Bolt
		Conjure Flame Atronach
		Conjure Storm Atronach
		Bound Sword, I\'ve never seen her use this spell.

If you want to change her gear, stats, I suggest Extensible Follower Framework by Expired, found here http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12933, don\'t install with NMM though, download the NMM version, unzip it, and copy XFLMain.exm, XFLMain.bsa, XFLDialogue.esp, XFLPlugins.esp, and XFLTweaks.esp to your Skyrim/Data folder, or install the No BSA version with NMM.  UFO should work too, but I prefer EFF for the group commands. 

You\'ll find her in Whiterun, she patrols the city from 0800 to 1200, and again from 1300 to 1700
From 1200 to 1300 and from 1700 to 1900 she\'ll be in Dragonsreach eating
From 1900 to 2100 she\'ll be in the Drunken Huntsman and from 2100 to 2300 in the Bannered Mare partying (hopefully not too much)

She\'ll be wearing the black version of Ashara Princess of the Woods, here http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18008, and jewelry from Ashara Dimonized Dress and Dragon Jewelry here 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14146, both by SydneyB.

Since SydneyB graciously allowed me to use parts of these two in this mod, you\'re not required to install it, but I highly recommend both mods.

Installation is easiest with NMM
Or if you want to install manually extract someplace, right click on CGKarena, copy the data folder, and paste it in your Skyrim folder.

Uninstall with NMM if you used NMM to install
Or if installed manually:
Delete:
Skyrim\\Data\\CGKarena.esp
Skyrim\\Data\\Meshes\\Actor\\Character\\facegendata\\facegeom\\CGKarena.esp
Skyrim\\Data\\Meshes\\Karena\\
Skyrim\\Data\\Textures\\Actor\\Character\\facegendata\\facetint\\CGKarena.esp
Skyrim\\Data\\Textures\\Karena\\

Any requests for changes I\'ll try to accommodate, but changing faces\\editing followers in the CK is 
tricky, and can corrupt the file to point its unusable.

Credits:  These modders did all the hard work, I just put stuff together, they\'re the artists.
dimon99 for the best body
BellaGail for her face textures
nevenbridge for the great eyes
Apachii for the awesome hairs, and for letting me upload a version that includes the hair.
eamico who I got the sandbox idea from
SydneyB for the outfit, and allowing me to upload it as part of this mod

Other Mods I use for lighting:
ULTRA REALISTIC WORLD LIGHTING: Normal Setting uploaded by MGE  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13531
CLARALUX - More and Brighter Lights by MyGoodEye  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17605
IMAGINATOR - Visual Control Device for Skyrim by MyGoodEye and Gopher  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13049
author: CrimsonGeezer
